name: Ali Baba
overview: In 2000 the developer Nabil Gonem published His Low Bugdet game Ali Baba . The game was then distributed for 35 DM by Nabil Gonem himself and appeared on diskette. In 2001, the Amiga Arena received permission to offer Ali Baba as a full version for download. Unfortunately, the developer had already sold his Amiga at that time and was no longer in possession of his own game. The Amiga Arena did not manage to reach a full version, since the game was hardly widespread. Was sold. The diskette version could not be found until 2015.
